title: [Site Update] More formatting tools and renamed sub-community
body:
**Hey Summoners!**

We rolled out a few new features today:

* Added a few more buttons to the toolbar to let you add formatting to your posts faster. These include **bold**, *italics*, ~~strikethrough~~ and adding [links](http://community.na.leagueoflegends.com/)!
* Renamed the "Beta Feedback" sub-community to "New Community Feedback" to hopefully guide Summoners looking for the [PBE Forum](http://community.pbe.leagueoflegends.com) in the right direction.
* Fixed messaging for low-level Summoners trying to vote on Discussions or Comments.

Please let us know what you think of the new changes!
